Text: You upload a lot of stuff but these Champions League uploads are some of the most retarded things I've ever seen.WARNING,if you're looking for football this is NOT the place,this contains 50 minutes + of the "experts" in the studio talking about the game,then as soon as the whistle is blown to start the game it cuts straight to the final whistle and then back to the studio.This is the 2nd time I've wasted time and bandwidth downloading this crap,you've uploaded everything EXCEPT the match!!!!.Why???????  Damn fucktards is what you are,don't waste your time with this crap.
